sn35.159:3.1: 159 Focus, the Exterior, and the End of Relishing
sn35.159:4.1: “Mendicants, focus on the source of sights. Truly see the impermanence of sights.
sn35.159:4.2: When a mendicant does this, they become disillusioned with sights.
sn35.159:4.3: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.159:4.5: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.
sn35.159:4.6: Focus on the source of sounds …
